name: The Places We Used to Go
name_original: The Places We Used to Go
description:
Directions:

Left and right arrow keys to move within horizontally oriented scenes

Up and down arrow keys to move within vertically oriented scenes

Spacebar key to pause at any time

Mouse scroll wheel to zoom in and out

There is audio and voice-over narration! For the full experience, use the provided headphones (please clean before use).
